about_the_game:
In the demo version, some phone apps are not included. The number of girls, special scenes, and dance animation variety is slightly reduced.

Other than that, it is designed in line with the main game. Enjoy the experience!

Discover Captivating Videos of Stunning Women

Date Banger’s world invites you to explore the mesmerizing videos of six unique girls, each with their own style and charm!

Like the Girls and Get Their Attention

Swipe through videos, match with the girls you like, and make them notice you. Take the first step toward an exciting connection!

Invite Them Over and Let the Party Begin

Call the girls to your place for a fun-filled night of dancing and connection. Turn up the music and enjoy a night to remember!

Every Girl Has Her Own Unique Personality

Whether fun and spontaneous or mysterious and intriguing, each girl brings something different. Find the one who matches your vibe!

Unlimited Possibilities with Your Phone

Use apps on your phone to earn money, talk to the girls, and make sure they’re impressed. Soon, they’ll be falling for you!

content_descriptors.notes:
“Date Banger” is a game where adults go out on a date, have a good time and then have sexual intercourse. All the people in the game is 18+ adults. Every sex act happens with consent.

Tobacco and alcohol use do not play a role in the game.

name: Date Banger Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Date Banger is an exhilarating 3D adult dating game where you meet stunning girls by swiping through videos. Engage in rhythm games and fun activities to charm and win over a variety of beautiful girls. Dive into a world of pleasure, unforgettable moments.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Turkish
